org.grouplens.lenskit.predict

Class RatingPredictorItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.predict.RatingPredictorItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class RatingPredictorItemScorer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemScorer
    Item scorer that uses rating predictions. Use this if you want to use the outputs of a sophisticated rating predictor somewhere that requires item scorers.
    Since:
    2.1

           long item)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score a single item.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a score.
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The score, or Double.NaN if no score can be generated.

      • score

        @Nonnull
public SparseVector score(long user,
                         @Nonnull
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score a collection of items.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.
